scripts.serve: npm run clean && export NODE_ENV=modernize.com IS_LOCAL=true && vite
scripts.serve-qa: npm run clean && export NODE_ENV=qa.modernize.com IS_LOCAL=true && vite
scripts.preview: export NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV-${NODE_ENV-modernize.com}} IS_LOCAL=false && vite build && vite preview
scripts.preview-qa: export NODE_ENV=qa.modernize.com IS_LOCAL=false && vite build && vite preview
